# 📍 Prepositions

Show relationship in time, space, or direction.

# 🧭 Common Types:

  • Place: in, on, under, above
  • Time: at, in, on, before
  • Direction: to, into, onto

🔹 She is at the station.
🔹 Put it on the table.

Punctuation 🧠 Parts of Speech
